titleStmt.title: Caesar and Pompey a Roman tragedy, declaring their vvarres. Out of whose euents is euicted this proposition. Only a iust man is a freeman. By George Chapman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, and are to be sold by Godfrey Edmonson, and Thomas Alchorne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The tragedy of Cæsar and Pompey.
A variant of the edition with title: The warres of Pompey and Caesar (STC 4992).
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
